description: This is a Python script that acts as a command-line interface for a project initializer tool. It parses CLI arguments, creates project configuration objects, generates a project template, and outputs the configuration details in JSON format. It includes functions for parsing parameters, creating project configs, and converting template info to dictionaries.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Represents initialization information for a project template, including commands and environment configuration.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Holds the configuration details for a project such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enum-like class that provides a method from_string to get project type enums.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for creating project templates and initializing projects.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a string of comma-separated key=value pairs into a dictionary with correctly typed values.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Constructs a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on a provided base path.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary suitable for JSON serialization, resolving relative paths.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs a JSON-formatted result indicating success or failure along with messages and configuration details.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
